name: Finger Spinner-指尖上的陀螺
description:
描述
最轻松的旋转器在这里！

你有5个滑动可以用你的手指设置最好的旋转。等待它停止并扫除甜蜜的回报！升级傻瓜旋转器

每个旋转都会使您更接近解锁新的微型旋钮。你们可以解锁吗？



Fidget hand spinner simulator game will help you to free yourself from the stress. It will make you relax. Just swipe to play and spin the fidget spinner. Swipe your finger as hard as you can to get high score. It is a toy for adults and children to spend time. You only need to spin this cool fidget hand spinner. Fidget spinner is also known as hand spinner and fidget cube game.
